sense.def:
Kadar človek stori nekaj napačnega
knowingly
, se zaveda napake, ko jo naredi.

seg.quote: They knowingly broke laws that ban trade in rare reptiles.

sense.def:
To look, smile, or wink knowingly
pomeni gledati, smehljati se ali mežikati tako, da pokažemo, da tisto razumemo, čeprav v bistvu ni bilo neposredno omenjeno.

seg.quote: The girls looked knowingly at each other.
